name: Puzzle Surfers FREE
description:
Tilt your iPhone to make waves! Guide your surfer through devious puzzles and help Jack save Jill from evil surfer-stealing aliens. Sideways and often upside-down, this 360 degree puzzle adventure game offers a surfing experience like no other!

This taste of Puzzle Surfers features:
- 10 challenging puzzles from the full version
- Customisable characters and boards
- Hand-drawn cartoon story sequences

... Or buy the full version for more puzzles and more fun!
